name: Fake RBI Regulatory Notice Scam
description: Scammer impersonates the Reserve Bank of India, claiming the victim's account is flagged for Aadhaar non-compliance, directing them to a phishing link.

turns.scammer_message: IMPORTANT NOTICE from Reserve Bank of India: Your bank account linked to Aadhaar has been flagged for non-compliance with new RBI guidelines. Immediate verification required to avoid account seizure.
turns.notes: Initial authoritative notice from fake RBI.

turns.scammer_message: As per RBI Circular No. RBI/2026-27/48, all accounts must be re-verified. Complete your verification online at http://rbi-compliance-verify.in/kyc or call the RBI compliance helpline at +91-8877665544.
turns.notes: Phishing link and phone number introduced with fake circular reference.

turns.scammer_message: If you are unable to access the portal at http://rbi-compliance-verify.in/kyc, you can verify manually. Please provide your bank account details or transfer Re 1 to verification account 1122334455667788 for identity confirmation.
turns.notes: Bank account revealed alongside repeated phishing link.

turns.scammer_message: WARNING: Your account seizure process has been initiated. You have 4 hours remaining. Visit http://rbi-compliance-verify.in/kyc immediately or call +91-8877665544. Failure to comply will result in legal action under Banking Regulation Act.
turns.notes: Escalation with legal threats and repeated link/phone.

turns.scammer_message: FINAL NOTICE: Account seizure order signed. Last chance to comply. Transfer verification amount to 1122334455667788 or complete at http://rbi-compliance-verify.in/kyc. Call +91-8877665544 for emergency exemption.
turns.notes: Final warning repeating all extractable data.
